welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Castaic, where the charm of small-town America meets the beauty of nature. Known for its stunning landscapes and outdoor activities, we invite you to experience all that our city has to offer and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Van Nuys Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Van Nuys Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bob Hope Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bob Hope Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Oxnard Airport is a small and modern facility that serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Oxnard Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a more exclusive and comfortable experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Ynez Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Ynez Airport caters to private jets and executive flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
